reqs:
Pre-reqs: (Second year standing in the Faculty of Arts or Faculty of Science.)
This section of ASIC 200 is restricted to students in second-year Arts or Science (BA or BSC).
The course will be held in Room 105 and associated facilities of the Michael Smith Building which is located on East Mall directly behind the UBC Bookstore. To access the waiting list conatct Dr. Allen Sens at asens@mail.ubc.ca
courseName: Global Issues in the Arts and Sciences
description: Selected global issues explored through the methodologies and perspectives of both the physical and life sciences and the humanities and social sciences.
